text: Yakshcho vy disbelieve, BOH ne potrebuye budʹ khto. Ale Vin ne lyubytʹ shchob pobachyty Yoho sluzhbovtsiv pryymayutʹ nepravylʹne rishennya. Yakshcho vy vyrishyte oderzhuvaty appreciative, Vin musytʹ dlya vas. Niyaka dusha ne nosytʹ hrikhy budʹ-yakoyi inshoyi dushi. Ostatochno, do vashoho Lorda ye vashe vidshkoduvannya, todi Vin poinformuye vas vse vy zrobyly. Vin znaye tsilkom nayhlybshi dumky
